title: BRIEF-Sabesp announces corporate reorganization
text: March 12, 2018 / 6:39 AM / in 11 minutes BRIEF-Sabesp announces corporate reorganization March 12 (Reuters) - Sabesp: * MATERIAL FACT: CORPORATE REORGANIZATION OF SABESP * SÃO PAULO STATE GOVERNMENT RECEIVED FROM GROUP OF INVESTORS LETTER AIMING POTENTIAL ACQUISITION OF PART OF SHARES, HELD BY GESP * ‍TRANSACTION STRUCTURED EXCLUSIVELY AT HOLDCO LEVEL AND WILL NOT AFFECT CORPORATE CONTROL OF SABESP, WHICH WILL REMAIN HELD BY GESP CONSISTENTLY​ * LETTER WILL BE ASSESSED BY STATE PRIVATIZATION PROGRAM’S BOARD WHICH HAS AUTHORITY TO DECIDE FOR CONTINUITY AND CONDITIONS * IDENTITY OF INVESTORS AND CONTENT OF LETTER WILL BE KEPT UNDER SECRECY Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
